channel.title: [317] Black Gameframe
channel.description:
As usual, I've got a problem with the Linux version of Java.
When I login, everything works (except character saves aren't recognized for some reason) except for the gameframe.
As you can see...
[img]http://www.zimagez.com/full/a1e5ba2fedf4a9bf8302d8b06046bee3aa569f418ee8d7ef26a1fcbd0408a4be80a216263f773270b066627fa96ef61e7ea9200778af2cd8.php[/img]
[size=18pt]Edit: After posting this, I realized it might not be loading the actual sprites. If anyone can confirm this, I can fix my problem.[/size]

As usual, I’ve got a problem with the Linux version of Java.

When I login, everything works (except character saves aren’t recognized for some reason) except for the gameframe.
